title: If League of Legends was a Horror Film

embed.description: This is what League of Legends would look like as a horror movie. Subscribe for more Videos! Thanks for Watching

body:
Short Movie trailer I made for if League was a Horror Film. Stayed up all night making this for yall so let me know what you think of it!

Cheers,

Obeejuan

Edit: Let me know what genre to make next.

Edit: Part 2 "If League if Legends was a Romantic Comedy' is now made, Posted on boards.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/02vpfUd2-if-league-of-legends-was-a-romantic-comedy

Edit: Part 3 :If League was an Action Movie" Now posted to Boards.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/snYIseRN-if-league-of-legends-was-an-action-movie

replies.body:
Neat! I love the editing. A lot of the beats were spot on, and I'm a sucker for cutting to black and back to footage, especially when done well. ^^

I did get more of an action feel from it, instead of a horror-y one, though.  Maybe because of the music?
Thanks for the feedback! Yeah It kinda has a LOTR feel now that you mention it.
Something with piano or violin would be awesome :3
I got kind of a thriller feel (the genre, not the song)
All the scares are shown in the trailer. Classic.
Hahaha so true
Can not upvote more then once makes me sad, the editing was amazing i would definitely want to see more.
Thanks! I'll be doing a different genre coming up tonight so Look for that
Well done~~{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

If league of legends was a romantic comedy.

Good luck, your gonna need it.
Challenge accepted
Ahri x Leona it's everything I've ever wanted
Alright I made it for you! its posted on the board
N1
If league was a buddy cop movie :D Can you just imagine Cait and Vi? "Bad Boys" style with Voli and and Trundle as the guys they make fun of :D
haha. Voli and Trundle would be like from The Other Guys.
Make this Riot! This is really good! Nice job. Really Like it. Rito would make so much more money if they made more cinemas.
Yeah they should make more champion videos

With all the balance issues, It's already a horror film. :p


Honestly... Great Job!
Illaoi is a horror film
No, she is a hentai video.
I believe it would be accurate to say that your trailer here is better than anything Riot has put out for the Harrowing in the past 12 months
What video editor did you use? I'm looking for a good one.
Im using Premiere Pro. its like $8 a month from adobe. What kind of videos are you making?
League already becomes a horror film the second a lonely ADC sees a "!" above their head.
Lol everyone is going on about Rengar. I need to make a spotlight on him

It baffles me how people are able to make things like this.
This is legendary.

Great job!
Ps. Try one with a rusty violin soundtrack.
Thanks! Whats a rusty violin track it sounds cool, you should send me a link!
{{champion:19}}  im like him in front on this video. _THIS       IS      FUCKING       AWESOME_
Thanks broski
the true horror film for me is when i see my mates playing , acutally it burns my eyes .

rengar would be featured!

you're quietly walking..

WHEN SUDDENLY A HELL SPAWN COMES OUT OF NOWHERE AND BACKSTABS YOU!
Lol very imaginative ;p

Romantic Comedy.

Just do it. 

Ahri x Leona 5lyf
Haha that one might be a little tough. RomCom would be good though
Alrighty Romantic Comedy is made. Posted on the Board! Sorry its not Ahri and Leona though.
Awesome job!  Makes me sad Riot stopped doing Halloween stuff :(.
I Know right. All their character release videos are just voice over now.
what program use
Im Using Premiere Pro
is better than sony vegas?
Theres more tutorials and support for premiere pro so id say so.
but is there more features?
Yeah Premiere Pro is the best id say. And theres a free 30 day trial so give it a shot
is it hard to use ? / wrap head around
Nope just give it a go. Learn from youtube
k man thx
so good
logged in just say that this is amazing, also have my upvote{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
